Enums/BMSCoreError.html#/s:FO7BMSCore12B.name: malformedUrl
Enums/BMSCoreError.html#/s:FO7BMSCore12B.abstract: The URL provided in the Request initializer is invalid.

Enums/BMSCoreError.html#/s:FO7BMSCore12B.name: serverRespondedWithError
Enums/BMSCoreError.html#/s:FO7BMSCore12B.abstract: The network request failed due to a 4xx or 5xx status code.

Enums/BMSCoreError.html.name: BMSCoreError
Enums/BMSCoreError.html.abstract: Indicates a failure that occurred within the BMSCore framework.

Enums/NetworkConnection.html#/s:FO7BMSCo.name: noConnection
Enums/NetworkConnection.html#/s:FO7BMSCo.abstract: The device has no connection to the internet.

Enums/NetworkConnection.html#/s:FO7BMSCo.name: WiFi
Enums/NetworkConnection.html#/s:FO7BMSCo.abstract: The device is connected to a WiFi network.

Enums/NetworkConnection.html#/s:FO7BMSCo.name: WWAN
Enums/NetworkConnection.html#/s:FO7BMSCo.abstract: The device is using cellular data (i.e. 4G, 3G, or 2G).

Classes/NetworkMonitor.html#/s:ZvC7BMSCo.name: networkChangedNotificationName
Classes/NetworkMonitor.html#/s:ZvC7BMSCo.abstract: When using the startMonitoringNetworkChanges() method, register an observer with NotificationCenter using this Notification.Name.

Classes/NetworkMonitor.html#/s:vC7BMSCor.name: cellularNetworkType
Classes/NetworkMonitor.html#/s:vC7BMSCor.abstract: The type of cellular data network available to the iOS device.

Classes/NetworkMonitor.html#/s:vC7BMSCor.name: currentNetworkConnection
Classes/NetworkMonitor.html#/s:vC7BMSCor.abstract: Detects whether the iOS device is currently connected to the internet via WiFi or WWAN, or if there is no connection.

Classes/NetworkMonitor.html#/s:FC7BMSCor.name: init()
Classes/NetworkMonitor.html#/s:FC7BMSCor.abstract: Creates a new instance of NetworkMonitor only if the current device’s network can be accessed.

Classes/NetworkMonitor.html#/s:FC7BMSCor.name: stopMonitoringNetworkChanges()
Classes/NetworkMonitor.html#/s:FC7BMSCor.abstract: Stops monitoring changes in the currentNetworkConnection that were started by startMonitoringNetworkChanges().

Classes/NetworkMonitor.html.name: NetworkMonitor
Classes/NetworkMonitor.html.abstract: Use the NetworkMonitor class to determine the current status of the iOS device’s connection to the internet.

Enums/NetworkConnection.html.name: NetworkConnection
Enums/NetworkConnection.html.abstract: Describes how the device is currently connected to the internet.

Classes/Response.html#/s:vC7BMSCore8Resp.name: isSuccessful
Classes/Response.html#/s:vC7BMSCore8Resp.abstract: The response is considered successful if the returned status code is in the 2xx range.

Classes/Response.html#/s:FC7BMSCore8Resp.name: init(responseData:httpResponse:isRedirect:)
Classes/Response.html#/s:FC7BMSCore8Resp.abstract: Converts an HTTPURLResponse to a more accessible response object.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:vC7BMSCore11.name: resourceUrl
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:vC7BMSCore11.abstract: URL that the request is being sent to.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:vC7BMSCore11.name: queryParameters
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:vC7BMSCore11.abstract: The query parameters to append to the resourceURL.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:vC7BMSCore11.name: requestBody
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:vC7BMSCore11.abstract: The request body is set when sending the request via send(requestBody:completionHandler:).

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:vC7BMSCore11.name: allowRedirects
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:vC7BMSCore11.abstract: Determines whether request should follow HTTP redirects.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:vC7BMSCore11.name: cachePolicy
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:vC7BMSCore11.abstract: Deterimes the cache policy to use for sending request.

Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:FC7BMSCore11.name: send(requestBody:completionHandler:)
Classes/BaseRequest.html#/s:FC7BMSCore11.abstract: Send the request asynchronously with an optional request body.

Structs/BMSURLSession.html#/s:FV7BMSCore.name: dataTask(with:completionHandler:)
Structs/BMSURLSession.html#/s:FV7BMSCore.abstract: Creates a task that retrieves the contents of the specified URL, and passes the response to the completion handler.

Structs/BMSURLSession.html#/s:FV7BMSCore.name: uploadTask(with:fromFile:completionHandler:)
Structs/BMSURLSession.html#/s:FV7BMSCore.abstract: Creates a task that uploads a file to the URL specified in the request object.

Classes/Response.html.name: Response
Classes/Response.html.abstract: Contains useful response data from an HTTP request made by the Request class.

Enums/HttpMethod.html.name: HttpMethod
Enums/HttpMethod.html.abstract: The HTTP method to be used in the Request class initializer.

Classes/BMSClient/Region.html.name: Region
Classes/BMSClient/Region.html.abstract: The region where your Bluemix service is hosted.

Classes/BMSClient.html#/s:ZvC7BMSCore9BM.name: sharedInstance
Classes/BMSClient.html#/s:ZvC7BMSCore9BM.abstract: The singleton that is used for all BMSClient activity.

Classes/BMSClient.html#/s:vC7BMSCore9BMS.name: bluemixAppRoute
Classes/BMSClient.html#/s:vC7BMSCore9BMS.abstract: Specifies the base Bluemix application backend URL.

Classes/BMSClient.html#/s:vC7BMSCore9BMS.name: bluemixRegion
Classes/BMSClient.html#/s:vC7BMSCore9BMS.abstract: Specifies the region where the Bluemix service is hosted.

Classes/BMSClient.html#/s:vC7BMSCore9BMS.name: requestTimeout
Classes/BMSClient.html#/s:vC7BMSCore9BMS.abstract: Specifies the allowed timeout (in seconds) for all Request network requests.

Classes/BMSClient.html.name: BMSClient
Classes/BMSClient.html.abstract: A singleton that serves as the entry point to Bluemix client-server communication.
